description.value:
Allows User to siphon energy into their own body from a functioning machine or battery. Making +10 Toughness Test near an external source of energy, success removes one Fatigue, +1 per Degree of Success. They can alternatively use this to recharge an internal resoervoir implant.

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: -
